name: jd-analyzer
description: Comprehensive AI Product Engineer career transition tool: Automated JD collection from LinkedIn/Wellfound using Playwright, spaCy-based skill extraction with YAML taxonomy, weighted profile matching (Required: 10pt, Nice-to-have: 3pt), actionable insights (Top 5 skills to learn, Top 10 companies), and Jinja2 markdown reports with market trends and remote work statistics.
author: Agent Beta (Architect)
